# Preface {-}

_Review and practice common data structures to prepare for your... interviewgation!_

In this book based on Andrei Neagoie's [Master the Coding Interview: Data Structures + Algorithms](https://www.udemy.com/course/master-the-coding-interview-data-structures-algorithms/){target="_blank"} you will be able to learn/review common data structures, algorithms and interview techniques.

PS: if you are looking for a job, you should totally checkout [Andrei's courses](https://www.udemy.com/user/andrei-neagoie/){target="_blank"}!
